info.task: read unchecked menuitemcheckbox in a group in a submenu
info.title: Read unchecked menu item checkbox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: focusonstylecolor
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Style/Color' menu item
setupScript.source:
// Move focus to the "Style/Color" menu item
testPageDocument.querySelectorAll('[role=menuitem]')[1].focus();

user: Navigate to 'Italic' menu item checkbox with down arrow.
instructions.raw: Open "Style/Color" menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item checkbox with down arrow. | Read the 'Italic' menu item checkbox
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the 'Font Style ' group are conveyed
The name and role of the 'Font Style' group are conveyed
